Name: Blue Heaven
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Actually more aqua than blue, this sweet concoction includes orange, almond, lime cordial and pineapple.
Nutrition: One serving of Blue Heaven contains 295 calories
